thread.title: London revisited
thread.title_full: London revisited - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: anjilib
title: London revisited
text: I had not been to London for 27 years. Kensington was a superb area in which to stay. The hotel was right across the street from the tube, which was super-convenient. Lots of attractions closeby - the V&A Museum, Science Museum, Natural History Museum, as well as Kensington Palace & gardens & Harrods, all within walking distance. Pay the small extra amount for the Lounge Access at the Hotel - entitles you to breakfast & Happy Hour; coffee & tea. Backs onto a garden - such a treat. Woke up to the birds chirping every morning. Excellent service.
